column1: The Pit Room////We each did a meat and side. I had pork ribs and green beans (they were out of okra)
column2: my boyfriend had brisket and elote
column3: and my dad had jalapeno-cheddar pork sausage and mac and cheese. It came out to $10-13 a person. Portions are big enough that this makes for a more sensible meal than the suggested dinner with two sides.
